00021 #ifndef __RDPSND_H
00022 #define __RDPSND_H
00023 
00024 struct audio_packet
00025 {
00026         struct stream s;
00027         uint16 tick;
00028         uint8 index;
00029 
00030         struct timeval arrive_tv;
00031         struct timeval completion_tv;
00032 };
00033 
00034 struct audio_driver
00035 {
00036         void (*add_fds) (int *n, fd_set * rfds, fd_set * wfds, struct timeval * tv);
00037         void (*check_fds) (fd_set * rfds, fd_set * wfds);
00038 
00039           RD_BOOL(*wave_out_open) (void);
00040         void (*wave_out_close) (void);
00041           RD_BOOL(*wave_out_format_supported) (RD_WAVEFORMATEX * pwfx);
00042           RD_BOOL(*wave_out_set_format) (RD_WAVEFORMATEX * pwfx);
00043         void (*wave_out_volume) (uint16 left, uint16 right);
00044 
00045           RD_BOOL(*wave_in_open) (void);
00046         void (*wave_in_close) (void);
00047           RD_BOOL(*wave_in_format_supported) (RD_WAVEFORMATEX * pwfx);
00048           RD_BOOL(*wave_in_set_format) (RD_WAVEFORMATEX * pwfx);
00049         void (*wave_in_volume) (uint16 left, uint16 right);
00050 
00051         char *name;
00052         char *description;
00053         int need_byteswap_on_be;
00054         int need_resampling;
00055         struct audio_driver *next;
00056 };
00057 
00058 /* Driver register functions */
00059 struct audio_driver *alsa_register(char *options);
00060 struct audio_driver *libao_register(char *options);
00061 struct audio_driver *oss_register(char *options);
00062 struct audio_driver *sgi_register(char *options);
00063 struct audio_driver *sun_register(char *options);

00065 #endif // __RDPSND_H
